result.eng: I saw the poor old stooping man.
result.ga: Chonaic mé an seanfhear bocht cromtha
result.orig: Chonaic mé an seanfhear bocht cromtha
result.html: Chonaic mé an seanfhear bocht cromthaI saw the poor old stooping man.
result.ponchtml: Ċonaic mé an seanḟear boċt cromṫaI saw the poor old stooping man.

result.eng: He stayed a while looking at the old house.
result.ga: D'fhan sé tamall ag breathnú ar an seanteach
result.orig: D'fhan sé tamall ag breathnú ar an seanteach
result.html: D'fhan sé tamall ag breathnú ar an seanteachHe stayed a while looking at the old house.
result.ponchtml: D'ḟan sé tamall ag breaṫnú ar an seanteaċHe stayed a while looking at the old house.

result.eng: All they want is to take revenge on their old enemies.
result.ga: Níl uathu ach díoltas a bhaint amach ar a gcuid sean-naimhde
result.orig: Níl uathu ach díoltas a bhaint amach ar a gcuid sean-naimhde
result.html: Níl uathu ach díoltas a bhaint amach ar a gcuid sean-naimhdeAll they want is to take revenge on their old enemies.
result.ponchtml: Níl uaṫu aċ díoltas a ḃaint amaċ ar a gcuid sean-naiṁdeAll they want is to take revenge on their old enemies.

result.eng: I haven't paid road tax on that old car.
result.ga: Níor íoc mé cáin bhóthair ar an seancharr sin
result.orig: Níor íoc mé cáin bhóthair ar an seancharr sin
result.html: Níor íoc mé cáin bhóthair ar an seancharr sinI haven't paid road tax on that old car.
result.ponchtml: Níor íoc mé cáin ḃóṫair ar an seanċarr sinI haven't paid road tax on that old car.

result.eng: She married an old man.
result.ga: Phós sí seanfhear
result.orig: Phós sí seanfhear
result.html: Phós sí seanfhearShe married an old man.
result.ponchtml: Ṗós sí seanḟearShe married an old man.

result.eng: The poor old woman is on her last legs.
result.ga: Tá an tseanbhean bhocht ar an dé deiridh
result.orig: Tá an tseanbhean bhocht ar an dé deiridh
result.html: Tá an tseanbhean bhocht ar an dé deiridhThe poor old woman is on her last legs.
result.ponchtml: Tá an tseanḃean ḃoċt ar an dé deiriḋThe poor old woman is on her last legs.

result.eng: I am older than you.
result.ga: Tá mise níos sine ná tusa
result.orig: Tá mise níos sine ná tusa
result.html: Tá mise níos sine ná tusaI am older than you.
result.ponchtml: Tá mise níos sine ná tusaI am older than you.

result.eng: I met a couple of old friends from Baile na hAbhann while I was over there.
result.ga: Chas mé le cúpla seanchara as Baile na hAbhann nuair a bhí mé thall
result.orig: Chas mé le cúpla seanchara as Baile na hAbhann nuair a bhí mé thall
result.html: Chas mé le cúpla seanchara as Baile na hAbhann nuair a bhí mé thallI met a couple of old friends from Baile na hAbhann while I was over there.
result.ponchtml: Ċas mé le cúpla seanċara as Baile na hAḃann nuair a ḃí mé ṫallI met a couple of old friends from Baile na hAbhann while I was over there.

result.eng: Did you meet with a few old friends?
result.ga: Ar chas tú le cúpla seanchara
result.orig: Ar chas tú le cúpla seanchara
result.html: Ar chas tú le cúpla seancharaDid you meet with a few old friends?
result.ponchtml: Ar ċas tú le cúpla seanċaraDid you meet with a few old friends?

result.eng: Which of you is older, you or Siobhán?
result.ga: Cé acu duine agaibh is sine tusa nó Siobhán
result.orig: Cé acu duine agaibh is sine tusa nó Siobhán
result.html: Cé acu duine agaibh is sine tusa nó SiobhánWhich of you is older, you or Siobhán?
result.ponchtml: Cé acu duine agaiḃ is sine tusa nó SioḃánWhich of you is older, you or Siobhán?

result.eng: Siobhán is the oldest.
result.ga: Is í Siobhán is sine
result.orig: Is í Siobhán is sine
result.html: Is í Siobhán is sineSiobhán is the oldest.
result.ponchtml: Is í Sioḃán is sineSiobhán is the oldest.

result.eng: She is three years older than me.
result.ga: Tá sí trí bliana níos sine ná mise
result.orig: Tá sí trí bliana níos sine ná mise
result.html: Tá sí trí bliana níos sine ná miseShe is three years older than me.
result.ponchtml: Tá sí trí bliana níos sine ná miseShe is three years older than me.

result.eng: I am older than Bríd.
result.ga: Tá mise níos sine ná Bríd
result.orig: Tá mise níos sine ná Bríd
result.html: Tá mise níos sine ná BrídI am older than Bríd.
result.ponchtml: Tá mise níos sine ná BrídI am older than Bríd.

result.eng: Julian is the oldest in the family.
result.ga: Is é Julian an duine is sine sa chlann
result.orig: Is é Julian an duine is sine sa chlann
result.html: Is é Julian an duine is sine sa chlannJulian is the oldest in the family.
result.ponchtml: Is é Julian an duine is sine sa ċlannJulian is the oldest in the family.

result.eng: I am the third oldest.
result.ga: Is mise an tríú duine is sine
result.orig: Is mise an tríú duine is sine
result.html: Is mise an tríú duine is sineI am the third oldest.
result.ponchtml: Is mise an tríú duine is sineI am the third oldest.

result.eng: And are you the oldest?
result.ga: Agus an tusa an duine is sine
result.orig: Agus an tusa an duine is sine
result.html: Agus an tusa an duine is sineAnd are you the oldest?
result.ponchtml: Agus an tusa an duine is sineAnd are you the oldest?

result.eng: Which one of you is older?
result.ga: Cé acu duine agaibh is sine
result.orig: Cé acu duine agaibh is sine
result.html: Cé acu duine agaibh is sineWhich one of you is older?
result.ponchtml: Cé acu duine agaiḃ is sineWhich one of you is older?

result.eng: I have four brothers and two sisters myself and I'm the third eldest.
result.ga: Tá ceathrar deartháir agus beirt deirfiúr agam féin agus is mise an tríú duine is sine
result.orig: Tá ceathrar deartháir agus beirt deirfiúr agam féin agus is mise an tríú duine is sine
result.html: Tá ceathrar deartháir agus beirt deirfiúr agam féin agus is mise an tríú duine is sineI have four brothers and two sisters myself and I'm the third eldest.
result.ponchtml: Tá ceaṫrar dearṫáir agus beirt deirfiúr agam féin agus is mise an tríú duine is sineI have four brothers and two sisters myself and I'm the third eldest.

result.eng: I'm the eldest (of the children) in the family.
result.ga: Is mise an duine is sine sa chlann
result.orig: Is mise an duine is sine sa chlann
result.html: Is mise an duine is sine sa chlannI'm the eldest (of the children) in the family.
result.ponchtml: Is mise an duine is sine sa ċlannI'm the eldest (of the children) in the family.

result.eng: It's an old terraced house and there are only three rooms.
result.ga: Seanteach sraithe atá ann agus níl ach trí sheomra ann
result.orig: Seanteach sraithe atá ann agus níl ach trí sheomra ann
result.html: Seanteach sraithe atá ann agus níl ach trí sheomra annIt's an old terraced house and there are only three rooms.
result.ponchtml: Seanteaċ sraiṫe atá ann agus níl aċ trí ẛeomra annIt's an old terraced house and there are only three rooms.

result.eng: The incident that happened was a relic of the old era.
result.ga: Iarsma den tseanré a bhí san eachtra a tharla
result.orig: Iarsma den tseanré a bhí san eachtra a tharla
result.html: Iarsma den tseanré a bhí san eachtra a tharlaThe incident that happened was a relic of the old era.
result.ponchtml: Iarsma den tseanré a ḃí san eaċtra a ṫarlaThe incident that happened was a relic of the old era.

result.eng: In place of the old neighbours, a new family moved in who were always causing trouble.
result.ga: In áit na seanchomharsan bhog teaghlach nua isteach a bhí i gcónaí ag cothú trioblóide
result.orig: In áit na seanchomharsan bhog teaghlach nua isteach a bhí i gcónaí ag cothú trioblóide
result.html: In áit na seanchomharsan bhog teaghlach nua isteach a bhí i gcónaí ag cothú trioblóideIn place of the old neighbours, a new family moved in who were always causing trouble.
result.ponchtml: In áit na seanċoṁarsan ḃog teaġlaċ nua isteaċ a ḃí i gcónaí ag coṫú trioblóideIn place of the old neighbours, a new family moved in who were always causing trouble.

result.eng: The old barracks are in public ownership now.
result.ga: I seilbh an phobail atá an tseanbheairic anois
result.orig: I seilbh an phobail atá an tseanbheairic anois
result.html: I seilbh an phobail atá an tseanbheairic anoisThe old barracks are in public ownership now.
result.ponchtml: I seilḃ an ṗobail atá an tseanḃeairic anoisThe old barracks are in public ownership now.

result.eng: There is an old cemetery in the centre of Boston.
result.ga: Tá seanreilig i lár chathair Bhoston
result.orig: Tá seanreilig i lár chathair Bhoston
result.html: Tá seanreilig i lár chathair BhostonThere is an old cemetery in the centre of Boston.
result.ponchtml: Tá seanreilig i lár ċaṫair ḂostonThere is an old cemetery in the centre of Boston.

result.eng: I've known her long time.
result.ga: Tá seanaithne agamsa uirthi
result.orig: Tá seanaithne agamsa uirthi
result.html: Tá seanaithne agamsa uirthiI've known her long time.
result.ponchtml: Tá seanaiṫne agamsa uirṫiI've known her long time.

result.eng: All you need to care about is that the old folks are happy.
result.ga: Is cuma duitse ach an tseanlánúin a bheith sásta
result.orig: Is cuma duitse ach an tseanlánúin a bheith sásta
result.html: Is cuma duitse ach an tseanlánúin a bheith sástaAll you need to care about is that the old folks are happy.
result.ponchtml: Is cuma duitse aċ an tseanlánúin a ḃeiṫ sástaAll you need to care about is that the old folks are happy.

result.eng: I was in the bar with a few friends and it was great fun.
result.ga: Bhí mé sa bheár le cúpla cara agus bhí an chraic go hiontach
result.orig: Bhí mé sa bheár le cúpla cara agus bhí an chraic go hiontach
result.html: Bhí mé sa bheár le cúpla cara agus bhí an chraic go hiontachI was in the bar with a few friends and it was great fun.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí mé sa ḃeár le cúpla cara agus ḃí an ċraic go hiontaċI was in the bar with a few friends and it was great fun.

result.eng: Which of my friends will get an invitation?
result.ga: Cé acu de mo chairde a gheobhaidh cuireadh
result.orig: Cé acu de mo chairde a gheobhaidh cuireadh
result.html: Cé acu de mo chairde a gheobhaidh cuireadhWhich of my friends will get an invitation?
result.ponchtml: Cé acu de mo ċairde a ġeoḃaiḋ cuireaḋWhich of my friends will get an invitation?

result.eng: We are close friends.
result.ga: Is dlúthchairde muid
result.orig: Is dlúthchairde muid
result.html: Is dlúthchairde muidWe are close friends.
result.ponchtml: Is dlúṫċairde muidWe are close friends.

result.eng: In the company of friends.
result.ga: I gcuideachta cairde
result.orig: I gcuideachta cairde
result.html: I gcuideachta cairdeIn the company of friends.
result.ponchtml: I gcuideaċta cairdeIn the company of friends.

result.eng: We are friends.
result.ga: Is cairde muid
result.orig: Is cairde muid
result.html: Is cairde muidWe are friends.
result.ponchtml: Is cairde muidWe are friends.

result.eng: She is a friend of mine.
result.ga: Is cara liom í
result.orig: Is cara liom í
result.html: Is cara liom íShe is a friend of mine.
result.ponchtml: Is cara liom íShe is a friend of mine.

result.eng: These aren't friends, they're false friends.
result.ga: Ní cairde iad seo ach bréagchairde
result.orig: Ní cairde iad seo ach bréagchairde
result.html: Ní cairde iad seo ach bréagchairdeThese aren't friends, they're false friends.
result.ponchtml: Ní cairde iad seo aċ bréagċairdeThese aren't friends, they're false friends.

result.eng: No need to thank me, my friend.
result.ga: Níl aon bhuíochas ort a chara
result.orig: Níl aon bhuíochas ort a chara
result.html: Níl aon bhuíochas ort a charaNo need to thank me, my friend.
result.ponchtml: Níl aon ḃuíoċas ort a ċaraNo need to thank me, my friend.

result.eng: That's the end of the story, my friends.
result.ga: Sin deireadh leis an scéal a chairde
result.orig: Sin deireadh leis an scéal a chairde
result.html: Sin deireadh leis an scéal a chairdeThat's the end of the story, my friends.
result.ponchtml: Sin deireaḋ leis an scéal a ċairdeThat's the end of the story, my friends.

result.eng: I have the car on loan from a friend of mine.
result.ga: Tá an carr ar iasacht agam ó chara liom
result.orig: Tá an carr ar iasacht agam ó chara liom
result.html: Tá an carr ar iasacht agam ó chara liomI have the car on loan from a friend of mine.
result.ponchtml: Tá an carr ar iasaċt agam ó ċara liomI have the car on loan from a friend of mine.

result.eng: Welcome to Ireland, friends!
result.ga: Tá fáilte romhaibh go hÉirinn a chairde
result.orig: Tá fáilte romhaibh go hÉirinn a chairde
result.html: Tá fáilte romhaibh go hÉirinn a chairdeWelcome to Ireland, friends!
result.ponchtml: Tá fáilte roṁaiḃ go hÉirinn a ċairdeWelcome to Ireland, friends!

result.eng: I am sharing an apartment with a friend of mine.
result.ga: Tá mé ag roinnt árasáin le cara liom
result.orig: Tá mé ag roinnt árasáin le cara liom
result.html: Tá mé ag roinnt árasáin le cara liomI am sharing an apartment with a friend of mine.
result.ponchtml: Tá mé ag roinnt árasáin le cara liomI am sharing an apartment with a friend of mine.

result.eng: I speak to my friends at midday.
result.ga: Labhraím le mo chairde ag meán lae
result.orig: Labhraím le mo chairde ag meán lae
result.html: Labhraím le mo chairde ag meán laeI speak to my friends at midday.
result.ponchtml: Laḃraím le mo ċairde ag meán laeI speak to my friends at midday.

result.eng: Your friends are drinking pints.
result.ga: Tá bhur gcairde ag ól piontaí
result.orig: Tá bhur gcairde ag ól piontaí
result.html: Tá bhur gcairde ag ól piontaíYour friends are drinking pints.
result.ponchtml: Tá ḃur gcairde ag ól piontaíYour friends are drinking pints.

result.eng: My friend Deirdre was with me.
result.ga: Bhí mo chara Deirdre liom
result.orig: Bhí mo chara Deirdre liom
result.html: Bhí mo chara Deirdre liomMy friend Deirdre was with me.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí mo ċara Deirdre liomMy friend Deirdre was with me.

result.eng: Come on in, friends.
result.ga: Tagaigí isteach a chairde
result.orig: Tagaigí isteach a chairde
result.html: Tagaigí isteach a chairdeCome on in, friends.
result.ponchtml: Tagaigí isteaċ a ċairdeCome on in, friends.

result.eng: I'll be meeting some friends.
result.ga: Beidh mé ag bualadh le roinnt cairde
result.orig: Beidh mé ag bualadh le roinnt cairde
result.html: Beidh mé ag bualadh le roinnt cairdeI'll be meeting some friends.
result.ponchtml: Beiḋ mé ag bualaḋ le roinnt cairdeI'll be meeting some friends.

result.eng: I'm sharing a house with a friend of mine.
result.ga: Tá mé ag roinnt tí le cara liom
result.orig: Tá mé ag roinnt tí le cara liom
result.html: Tá mé ag roinnt tí le cara liomI'm sharing a house with a friend of mine.
result.ponchtml: Tá mé ag roinnt tí le cara liomI'm sharing a house with a friend of mine.

result.eng: I'm sharing the apartment with a friend of mine, Judy. She's very nice.
result.ga: Tá mé ag roinnt an árasáin le cara liom Judy Tá sí an-deas
result.orig: Tá mé ag roinnt an árasáin le cara liom Judy Tá sí an-deas
result.html: Tá mé ag roinnt an árasáin le cara liom Judy Tá sí an-deasI'm sharing the apartment with a friend of mine, Judy. She's very nice.
result.ponchtml: Tá mé ag roinnt an árasáin le cara liom Judy Tá sí an-deasI'm sharing the apartment with a friend of mine, Judy. She's very nice.

result.eng: Sometimes I have dinner in a restaurant with my friends.
result.ga: Uaireanta bíonn dinnéar agam i mbialann le mo chairde

result.eng: If I am your best friend, then that is a sorry state of affairs for you.
result.ga: Más mise an cara is deise duit is truacánta an mhaise duit

result.html: Más mise an cara is deise duit is truacánta an mhaise duitIf I am your best friend, then that is a sorry state of affairs for you.

result.eng: She called to her friend. {shouted}
result.ga: Ghlaoigh sí ar a cara
